file-invalid-type.title: Invalid File Type
file-invalid-type.message: The file type you have uploaded is not supported. Please upload files in the allowed formats.

file-too-large.title: File Too Large
file-too-large.message: The file you are trying to upload exceeds the maximum allowed size. Please reduce the file size and try again.

file-too-small.title: File Too Small
file-too-small.message: The file you are trying to upload is smaller than the minimum required size. Please check your file and try again.

file-many-files.title: Too Many Files
file-many-files.message: You have attempted to upload too many files at once. Please reduce the number of files and try again.

too-many-files.title: Too Many Files
too-many-files.message: You have exceeded the limit of maximum files allowed to upload. Please reduce the number of files and try again.

webcam-not-found.title: Webcam Not Found
webcam-not-found.message: No webcam device was detected. Please ensure your webcam is properly connected and try again.

defaultEmptyState.text: Feel free to check back later. If the issue persists, please contact support for assistance.
defaultEmptyState.title: Oops! It seems like there's no data to display at the moment.

greetingSubtext: Let's play a game of darts.
confirmCloseAppText: Do you really want to close the application? All unsaved data will be lost.
